cppcoreguidelines-avoid-c-arrays.description:
Description

The
cppcoreguidelines-avoid-c-arrays
check is an alias, please see
modernize-avoid-c-arrays
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-avoid-c-arrays.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
